control_center_adblock_advertisers.message: List of advertisers on this page

control_center_adblock_description.message: ads have been blocked on this website

control_center_datapoints.message: private data points have been removed

control_center_info_ads.message: You can choose to block or show advertisements on all or selected websites.

control_center_info_cliqz_tab.message: Cliqz Tab enhances new tabs with short-cuts to your most visited and favorite websites, and curated top news to keep you up to speed.

control_center_info_explicit.message: Вы хотите исключить веб-сайты которые связаны с порнографией или насилием из результатов поиска?

control_center_info_forget_mode.message: Websites that contain explicit content are automatically opened in Forget tabs. Visits to such sites are therefore not saved to your history.

control_center_info_hpn.message: If you wish to hide your IP address while searching the web, you can send your search queries through a network of proxy servers.

control_center_info_https.message: This function is provided by the open-source service HTTPS Everywhere. It improves the level of security by forcing encrypted HTTPS connections to websites whenever possible.

control_center_info_hw.message: The Human Web technology collects anonymized data of search queries and website visits by the community of users. It uses this data to build the web index that feeds the search function.

control_center_info_phishing.message: This technology identifies and blocks deceptive websites that try to get your passwords or account data.

control_center_info_share_location.message: Вы увидите наиболее релевантные результаты поиска, установив «Учитывать местоположение» в режим «Всегда». Данные местоположения используются исключительно для автоматического улучшения результатов поиска.

control_center_info_trackers.message: Integrated trackers record user activities on and across most websites. Anti-Tracking removes all data that could be used to identify you before it can be collected by these trackers. The figure shows how many data points have been removed on the active site.

control_center_offers_location_info.message: Don’t miss any local offers! Your location is used on a city or district level. It is not stored on any server, and is only used locally on your computer.

control_center_offers_show_info.message: Receive attractive discounts and bargains! MyOffrz only shows relevant content to you. It is developed according to the most stringent data privacy standards. None of your personal data is stored on any server.

control_center_telemetry_info.message: Только строгие анонимные технические данные и данные взаимодействия. Лично идентифицируемая информация («PII») никогда не высылается.
